title: Qualifications to understand Bhagavad-gita | Sri Chanchalapathi Dasa
speaker: HG Chanchalapathi Dasa

segments.key_quote: So, being a devotee in a transcendental relationship and not being envious of Krishna, these are the qualifications one must have in order to access the confidential knowledge of the Bhagavad Gita.
segments.summary: HG Chanchalapathi Dasa explains that devotion and lack of envy towards Krishna are essential qualifications for understanding the confidential knowledge of the Bhagavad Gita, based on Krishna's statements to Arjuna.
